summary.para: Contains operating system version information. The information includes major and minor version numbers, a build number, a platform identifier, and descriptive text about the operating system. This structure is used with the function.
To obtain additional version information, use the structure with instead.

member.name: OSVERSIONINFOA.dwOSVersionInfoSize
member.summary: The size of this data structure, in bytes. Set this member to sizeof(OSVERSIONINFO).

member.name: OSVERSIONINFOA.dwMajorVersion
member.summary: The major version number of the operating system. For more information, see Remarks.

member.name: OSVERSIONINFOA.dwMinorVersion
member.summary: The minor version number of the operating system. For more information, see Remarks.

member.name: OSVERSIONINFOA.dwBuildNumber
member.summary: The build number of the operating system.

summary.para: The operating system platform. This member can be the following value.

listheader.description: The operating system is Windows 7, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003, Windows XP, or Windows 2000.

member.name: OSVERSIONINFOA.szCSDVersion
member.summary: A null-terminated string, such as "Service Pack 3", that indicates the latest Service Pack installed on the system. If no Service Pack has been installed, the string is empty.
